General.Name: Bumitama Agri Ltd
General.Description: Bumitama Agri Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the production and trade of crude palm oil (CPO), palm kernel (PK), and related products for refineries in Indonesia. It is also involved in the cultivation of oil palm plantation; and operation of palm oil mills. In addition, the company engages in the harvesting and processing fresh palm fruit bunches (FFB) into CPO and PK; and business and management consultancy services. As of December 31, 2022, it managed a total planted area of approximately 187,628 hectares in Central Kalimantan, West Kalimantan, and Riau provinces. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. Bumitama Agri Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wellpoint Pacific Holdings Ltd.
General.Address: Jl. Melawai Raya, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12160
